BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: compat API push: fix error handling Make sure that the push endpoint does not always return 200 even in case of a push failure. Some of the code had to be massaged since encoding a report implies sending a 200. Fixes: #18751 Signed-off-by: Valentin Rothberg <vrothberg@redhat.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: compat API create/pull: fix error handling Make sure that the create endpoint does not always return 200 even in case of a failure. Some of the code had to be massaged since encoding a report implies sending a 200. Fixes: #15828 Signed-off-by: Valentin Rothberg <vrothberg@redhat.com>
